1594150.name: Looking for Imago
1594150.description:
Looking for Imago is a peaceful but yet challenging puzzle-platformer in which you will be led to tame insects & natural elements to progress in your own quest. It may also be the time to discover an atypical way to interact with the beings of this world.

In this game, you will endorse the responsibility of being a sprout carrier, one of those little beings who secretly takes care of delivering majestic tree sprouts.

â­ FEATURES

  • Tame your environment to overcome its obstacles
  • Interact with insects and natural elements in an original way
  • Control your character with a simple & fine tuned control scheme
  • Build your own levels and challenge your friends

ğŸŒ± WHAT'S INSIDE?

The full game is currently composed of more than 70 levels in 3 environments.
A lost insect can be saved in every levels. Hidden seeds can also be found to build a collection.
